attributes.action: GMP to carry on searching for Keith Bennett until he is found
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like gmp to carry on searching for Keith until he is found.  His mother has the right to bury him properly, dont give the right to Ian Brady to take this information to his grave. Give Winnie the piece she deserves.

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the Greater Manchester Police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
